utilities

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • utilities.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends Thread
    Odometer class for the robot All values in cm and radians unless otherwise specified.
    Version:
    3.0
